name: Karen vs Mobs
description:
Karen has many enemies. They come swarming  in, neverending.
She will fight and slash until she killed all the 4 Emperors.

You are facing wave after wave of mobs. Gather Exp, Gold and Skills for your Hero to make it through and kill all the 4 Emperors.

Simple controls

Q - Attack
W - Secondary Attack
Space - Potion
K - Flush the Toilet

Demo

This game can be played until Wave 5 for free.

Full Version & Install

1. Buy game on Itch.io

2. Get Access to Readme.txt

3. Enter the Code from the Readme here on this Demo Version when prompted

*Code will be stored in local browser storage

Contact

LandoDev@gmx.de or Comments section

Info

I made this game myself and it's my very first game.
I want to thank  all the creators of the many assets i have used in this game. Most of them are here on Itch.io.

Details of used assets are in the game and in the Readme file you get when you purchase the game.
